PerformanceResourceTimingRedirectStart.summary: The redirectStart read-only property returns a representing the start time of the fetch which that initiates the redirect.

remarks.para: If there are HTTP redirects when fetching the resource and if any of the redirects are not from the same origin as the current document, but the timing allow check algorithm passes for each redirected resource, this property returns the starting time of the fetch that initiates the redirect; otherwise, zero is returned.
To get the amount of redirects, see also .

PerformanceResourceTimingRedirectStart.value: The redirectStart property can have the following values:
